title: Fragments, 1973-51-124-a,b, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed (two reds, black) and yellow and blue applied by brush on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 10.5 x 47 cm (4 1/8 x 18 1/2 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 9 x 36 cm (3 9/16 x 14 3/16 in.)
description: Two fragments of a non-directional pattern of small flowers in bright colors on a black background.
